cast.overview: As the world falls, young Furiosa is snatched from the Green Place of Many Mothers into the hands of a great biker horde led by the warlord Dementus. Sweeping through the wasteland, they encounter the citadel presided over by Immortan Joe. The two tyrants wage war for dominance, and Furiosa must survive many trials as she puts together the means to find her way home.
cast.title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga

details.biography: Peter Sammak is an Australian-based actor best known for his performances in Director George Miller's Mad Max: Furiosa, ABC's Bay Of Fires and George Basha's Convict. Intense and authentic are the words for Peter Sammak, having grown up in the school of hard-knocks. Drawing from his upbringing and without formal training, Peter Sammak specializes in hard-man type characters who have an air of charm about them.
details.name: Peter Sammak
